item.description:
Come see a classic American film, "Airplane!" at Criterion Cinemas (at Temple and George Streets)!


**Yes, it's raining. Yes, it's the remnants of a tropical storm. Unless the power is out at the theatre, we're still going!**

Hilarity ensues when food poisoning strikes the crew and passengers of a 747 (including Leslie Nielsen), and it is up to a former fighter pilot, his old flame, and an uncouth doctor to land the plane safely.

Generally-speaking, these events are well-attended, so plan to be a few minutes early to buy tickets!

Meet up at Richter's for a pre-movie drink (my regular stop before a movie) at 10:45p.

Eric is your contact for this event, and contact info is in the RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the tall, handsome fellow with glasses. I won't be in the lobby after 11:25p
item.name: "Airplane!" Insomniac Theatre at Criterion Cinemas
